item.title: TikTok Video Editor for Top 5 Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented TikTok Video Editor to create engaging and captivating top 5 videos. The videos should be precisely 1 minute and at least one second long, showcasing the best of the chosen topics. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for selecting, editing, and arranging the footage in a visually appealing way. Attention to detail and creativity are a must to ensure the videos stand out in the TikTok community.
   Required skills:
   - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Ability to create smooth transitions and add effects
   - Understanding of TikTok trends and video formats
   - Strong storytelling and narrative skills

   Size: Small
   Duration: Under 1 month
   Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Band Photographer/Videographer - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a band photographer/videographer who is able to take photos and videos of a live performance, some behind the scenes shots during our tour in various locations in Germany which includes:

Berlin (4 July 8pm)
Rudolstadt (5 July 3.30pm, 6 July 4.30pm
Frankfurt (9 July 8pm)
Gottingen (10 July 7pm)

Open to you coming to one, or multiple locations.

We require either photos and audioless videos. (The video does not require editing, just short audioless clips that are high quality that may be edited at a later date).

The photos can be edited, or provided raw, depending on the costs.

Information about our tour, and our music can be found here: https://www.ukedeathsquad.com/touring

Budget: $233
Posted On: June 25, 2024 07:07 UTC
Category: Local Photography
Skills:Event Photography, Videography, Video Production, Photography, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Lightroom, Adobe Creative Suite
Skills: Event Photography, Videography, Video Production, Photography, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Lightroom, Adobe Creative Suite
Country: Australia

item.title: Who can help me make video's for youtube - Upwork
item.description:
I'm starting a new channel for youtube,
I'm looking for some one who can help me make and edit the video's.
I only provide the script and the voiceover and the rest you will do.
I want 2 video's for 5 dollars. That is the budget so don't apply if you can't do that price.
every other day a video ready,
mostly png,stickers,animation and text,also pictures maid with MS paint.
And also the icon making you will do.

I like someone to communicate quick and also work quick.
does this sound like you and do you agree with the price i said in this add then we will speak!

Budget: $20

item.title: Video Editor and Content Creator for Healthy Weight Loss Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor and content creator to join our team and assist in editing Youtube videos and creating engaging reels/shorts focused on healthy weight loss. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing software and be able to create visually appealing content that captures the attention of our audience. The selected individual will be responsible for trimming and organizing footage, adding relevant effects and transitions, and ensuring the videos align with our brand guidelines.

Skills:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Experience in creating engaging social media content
- Strong understanding of visual storytelling
- Knowledge of current trends in Youtube and Instagram reels/shorts

We are a fast-growing channel with a dedicated following, and we are looking for someone who can contribute fresh ideas and help us take our content to the next level. If you are passionate about health, wellness, and video editing, we would love to hear from you!

Please include links to your previous work and a brief description of your experience in the field.

Note: This position is remote and contractual

Hourly Range: $5.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 06:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Content Writing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Content Writing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: #5 LONG-TERM - Voiceover Artist needed for BOXING Celebrity News Youtube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We run a YouTube channel about BOXING Celebrity News and we’re looking for Male Voiceover Artist who can do the Voiceover for our channel.

The length of the videos will be around 8-14 minutes each.

This is a fantastic job opportunity available for anyone who can meet certain criteria. We are looking for a script writer who is extremely detail-oriented, can follow directions, and has a positive attitude!  

Here's just some of the criteria that this person would meet:  
- Good tonality
- Has their own computer and highspeed Internet connection.  
- Speaks and reads English fluently.  
- Has a “can-do” attitude while hitting deadlines and committing fully to the task at hand  

You will need to Narrate scripts similar to these channels:

https://www.youtube.com/@FightersCornerNews

https://www.youtube.com/@Fighttoday

https://www.youtube.com/@BoxingWorld2024/videos

https://www.youtube.com/@FightFuryUpdates/videos

We would provide you with the scripts

PLEASE NOTE: You must have experience as Voiceover Artist in This Niche.

IMPORTANT: Also, if you’ve ever Narrate any scripts for Previous or currently youtube channel in this niche, please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!

Long Term and bonuses and raises are included over time.

300$ is per month based on 20 Video every month, each video is around 8-14 mins Video for 15$ payment.


Budget: $300
Posted On: June 25, 2024 06:36 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Casual Tone, Energetic Tone, Male, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, US English Dialect, Male Voice
Skills: Casual Tone, Energetic Tone, Male, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, US English Dialect, Male Voice
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: Rockstar marketing specialist to record an advertisement video for our company - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there! We are Everyday Translations.

Our company is just getting started and we need to start posting ads on Instagram and Facebook in order to start getting leads and also build a community.

We are looking for a person or a team that can record videos (reels/tiktoks) so we can have a lot of engagement on our social media.

We need someone who knows exactly how to write a hook, problem, solution and call to action so more people follow us and also to advertise our services.

Our only product is a translations service monthly subscription of $250-$350 and $800 per month.

We don't want to make videos only selling, we also want to create a community, so this is going to be a long term job.

Please share any ads you have made. We don't want templates or simple videos, we want real people talking.

Send us your quote per video. Remember this is going to be long term.

You'll take care of all the script, recording and editing.

Hourly Range: $14.00-$49.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 06:34 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Mobile Advertising, Social Media Management, Video Production, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Commercial
Skills: Mobile Advertising, Social Media Management, Video Production, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Commercial
Country: Venezuela
click to apply

item.title: Canva Animated template editor - Upwork
item.description:
Canva Animated Templates Editor

Are you an expert in creating and editing Canva animated templates, with a keen understanding of advertising and digital out-of-home (DOOH) campaigns? We’re looking for talented individuals who thrive in a team environment and are ready to deliver exceptional results at a fast pace.

Role Overview:

Create and edit Canva animated templates with precision and creativity.
Understand advertising principles, particularly in DOOH, to craft effective digital campaigns.
Collaborate closely with our team to meet project goals and timelines.
What We Offer:

Opportunity to work in a dynamic startup setting.
Chance to showcase your skills and grow professionally.
Competitive compensation and benefits package.
Hiring Process:

Initial 15-minute Canva editing test to assess template editing skills.
Longer Adobe test to create an advertisement based on a provided job spec.(1 hour)
If you’re ready to launch your career in a forward-thinking startup, we want to hear from you! Join us in shaping the future of digital advertising. Contact us today to learn more about this exciting opportunity.
This is a full-time post. Starting salary $500 + bonus after qualifying period

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 25, 2024 06:30 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Graphic Design, Canva
Skills: Motion Graphics, Graphic Design, Canva
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
